content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 May 2019Which credit card do you use / would you recommend for SimplyGo, and why? 3 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Tee-Ming Chew, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I'm currently using UOB PRIVI Miles Visa for my daily commute.Besides the 1.4 miles per S$1 spend, they are doing a promotion where you will also get 25% rebate with minimum $40 spent on transit!Super awesome to be able to tap using your iPhone/Apple Watch0 comments0

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 May 2019Depends on whether you are miles chaser or team cashback.As a miles chaser, I use my BOC Elite Miles World Mastercard for 1.5mpd. No minimum spend and it is the least complicated to think about.0 comments0

Lin JunxianLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 04 May 2019Using Unlimited standard chartered credit card!
1.5% cash back on all categories
No min. spending. 
No need to use brain. Did ez-reload on above cc. 1.5% cash back on the top up amount. So didn't bother using simplygo.0 comments0
